content: **crochet booties with flower for baby and children in drops alpaca** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years foot length 10 - 11 - 12 14 - 16 cm 4 -4 3/8 -4¾ 5½ -6¼ **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio 50-50-100 100-100 g color no 3140 light pink 50 g for all sizes color no 0100 off-white drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm us e/4 or size needed to get 20 single_crochet x 24 row with double thread = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 drops crochet hook size 3 mm c for rosettes **pattern links ** french version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b17&d_id=21
